name: MPEG-2 File with Main Profile Video and Layer II Audio Encoding

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

description: File containing an MPEG-2 program stream consisting of Main Profile MPEG-2 encoded video multiplexed with MPEG-1 and MPEG-2 Layer II encoded audio.  The program stream may also be delivered via a serial interface.
